titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2429) to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Barrow. Petition No: 109-11.

bill.summary: 12/15/2005--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2429) to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to provide for an increase in the Federal minimum wage.
